definition: Lianshui county in Huai'an 淮安[Huai2 an1], Jiangsu
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Wan's view was shared by Li Weiping, Party secretary of the Lianshui county in eastern Jiangsu province.
sentences.chinese: 江西東部漣水縣黨委書記李衛平同意王先生的看法。
